references.paper_title: NeRF: Representing scenes as neural radiance fields for view synthesis
references.reason: This paper introduced Neural Radiance Fields (NeRF), which revolutionized novel view synthesis and became a fundamental building block for subsequent research.

references.paper_title: 3d gaussian splatting for real-time radiance field rendering
references.reason: This paper presented 3D Gaussian Splatting (3DGS), a real-time rendering technique that offers an alternative to NeRFs and has gained significant traction in the field.
This paper described denoising diffusion probabilistic models, which are foundational to the development of diffusion models used in the present work.

references.paper_title: Score-based generative modeling through stochastic differential equations
references.reason: This paper laid the groundwork for score-based generative modeling and diffusion models using stochastic differential equations, which are utilized in this study.

references.paper_title: Image quality assessment: from error visibility to structural similarity
references.reason: This paper introduced the Structural Similarity Index (SSIM), a commonly used metric for evaluating image quality and used in the current paper.
